title: Netflix and quarantine
description:
Why is Netflix the clear winner of the streaming wars right now? Plus, are we gonna run out of stuff to watch?

Featuring:
Peter kafka (@pkafka)

Links to Resources Discussed:
Netflix had the best quarter in its history because of the pandemic

Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset

About Recode by Vox:
Recode by Vox helps you understand how tech is changing the world — and changing us.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
